amendatorysection.para: The referees must be sworn or affirmed well and faithfully to hear and examine the cause, and to make a just and true report therein according to the best of their understanding. The oath may be administered by any person authorized to take depositions.

annotation.para: Failure to take oath is an irregularity waived by proceeding to trial without objection. Lamaster v. Scofield and Cowperthwait, 5 Neb. 148 (1876).
